Articles.Content:
Built the cosmetically perfect truck, but can't get the fuel to the fuel cells? Or, built a box of fuel and want to hook it up to an engine? No worries.

Simply rotate the part directly below your fuel tank, then connect a line from it to what ever is below. Then simply slide the panel back. If done properly, it's nigh on invisible. Note that two are required for tanks if you wish to refuel them- one to and one fro.
